items.title: Total privacy
items.description: Ownership of PAN token is completely anonymous.

items.title: Community
items.description: We always take feedback, ideas and opinions from players and process them as quickly as possible.

items.title: Diversified
items.description: Player will be individual or group or company.

items.title: Transparent
items.description:
Transactions are decentralized with results will be public.
Specially, Pandora Box eliminates total manipulation from bookies.

earns.title: How to Earn
earns.description: Following on The Pandora Box's ecosytem, player will gain token by farming, airdrop and participating in bounty program.
